title: The difference between courageous vulnerability and wound-based oversharing + the #1 relationship killer according to human connection specialist Mark Groves
description:
Register for my 2020 Virtual Mental Health Solutions Summit here:https://www.drleafconference.com  **Early bird tickets end October 15  

When it comes to our relationships, we often fall into the trap of behaving like we think we should, rather than getting to the root of why and how we really connect to other people. In this podcast episode I speak with international speaker and human connection specialist Mark Groves about the nature of human connection, common relationship mistakes we all make, how to improve our relationships, the difference between vulnerability and oversharing, how to embrace our emotions and connections, what women need to know about men and what men need to know about women, and so much more!  

Read the show blog here:  https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/the-difference-between-courageous-vulnerability-and-wound-based-oversharing-the-1-relationship-killer-according-to-human-connection-specialist-mark-groves

For more info on Mark visit: 

https://markgroves.com/ 

https://createthelove.com/

Follow him on social media: @createthelove

-Public Goods (my favorite online stores!): Receive $15  off your first Public Goods order with NO MINIMUM purchase. Just go to https://publicgoods.com/drleaf or use code DRLEAF at checkout.  


Podcast Highlights

2:44 The power of laughter and how humor can heal us

7:20 The nature of human connection

18:27 How to deal with major relationship killers

36:50 Things women need to know about men that will help in a relationship

44:50 The importance of boundaries in a relationship

46:20 How to recover from a break up

55:26 The difference between being vulnerable and opening ourselves up too much
